text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with my new favorite food a rapist
i think that's how you pronounce it uh
tapas a rapist ar e pas and basically

going to taste and here's a secret

n precooked white cornmeal I have no
idea what that stands for I will

blog post but anyway it's cooked corn
ground white cornmeal which is really
fine it's almost like a corn flour so
it's not really as gritty as a cornmeal
or what we think of as cornmeal here so
anyway the process could not be simpler
tepid water slightly warm salt and all
you do is you sprinkle in that white
cornmeal until you have a moldable dough
and by the way this feels incredibly
cool so you're just going to keep adding
that until you have what feels like a
moist yet malleable dough and then
you're going to make little patties okay
so I figured right about there I'm good
so I pulled off a piece about the size
of a golf ball and I made it into a
patty
now you Venezuelans and or Colombians
watching you're probably going that's
not how you shape them you shape them
like this oh my god this guy's killing
me look how he's shaping them listen it
worked so if you have a better way to
shape them please send me your videos
I'll check it out so once I made it into
a patty which was about I don't know 3/8
of an inch thick I fried it in plain
vegetable oil over medium heat until
both sides were nicely golden brown I
estimate this went about 4 to 5 minutes
per side but you want to make sure it's
nice and crunchy and crisp on the
outside so I'm going to drain that on a
paper towel then you're going to let it
cool how long until it's cool enough to
handle and then the coolest thing
happens here as you cut in with a thin
serrated knife and you go around that
edge the top and bottom layers separate
so it's this incredible texture contrast
that crispy crunchy outer layer and that
moist chewy fluffy inner layer just
incredible incredible contrast your
stuffing with whatever you want in fact
in the blog post I'm going to put a link
to the restaurant that inspired these
and show you all their fillings this was
just some spicy pulled pork with some

try to name something that wouldn't be
